channel.title: 508 Shops!
channel.description: I am trying to make a 508 server does anyone know how to add shops to the server or any npcs like bandos or zamorak boss

item.title: 508 Shops!
item.dc:creator: @Fred_Dag1 Fred Dag1
item.description:
@Fred_Dag1 wrote:

[quote=“RuneScapeWPS, post:3, topic:232051”][quote author=glabay link=topic=305684.msg2499162#msg2499162 date=1224553515]
umm, you fail

no one has shop/trade frames otehr then palidino76 of google, and hes an assholw that won’t release.

also the npc are in autospawn.cfg
[/quote]

Dude don’t flame the kid, he was just asking a question. How does he fail lol? It’s easy to add shops to a 508 server, I have only added about 3 so far. The tricky part is Matching the Shop ID with the NPC ID, and the trickiest part is adding items, because it’s not like 377’s or 317’s with Shops.cfg =p If you wanna add shops, you need to

  1. Place the NPC in autospawn.cfg (I can only get the General Store, Aubury, and Turael)
  2. In the Frames.Java you need to make a sendQuest

{ ifOption("2"))and.playerrights >= 0 sendQuest("477"); } Seem’s to work for me, and I’m using Palidino76’s Base. I’m not sure if it only works for that one or something, but I tried it on RS2-Devolution and it didn’t work =p Hope this helps.[/quote] Nobody Has Palidino source out now a day’s do you have a blank one?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Shops!
item.dc:creator: @RuneScapeWPS RuneScapeWPS
item.description:
@RuneScapeWPS wrote:

[quote=“glabay, post:2, topic:232051”]umm, you fail

no one has shop/trade frames otehr then palidino76 of google, and hes an assholw that won’t release.

also the npc are in autospawn.cfg[/quote]

Dude don’t flame the kid, he was just asking a question. How does he fail lol? It’s easy to add shops to a 508 server, I have only added about 3 so far. The tricky part is Matching the Shop ID with the NPC ID, and the trickiest part is adding items, because it’s not like 377’s or 317’s with Shops.cfg =p If you wanna add shops, you need to

  1. Place the NPC in autospawn.cfg (I can only get the General Store, Aubury, and Turael)
  2. In the Frames.Java you need to make a sendQuest

{ ifOption("2"))and.playerrights >= 0 sendQuest("477"); } Seem’s to work for me, and I’m using Palidino76’s Base. I’m not sure if it only works for that one or something, but I tried it on RS2-Devolution and it didn’t work =p Hope this helps.

Read full topic
